keyMoments.title: Mr. 2 Bon Kurei's Debut
keyMoments.description: Mr. 2 Bon Kurei makes his first appearance as he is dispatched by Baroque Works to Little Garden to eliminate Mr. 3 for his failure.
keyMoments.significance: Introduction of one of the most memorable and beloved characters in One Piece, known for his flamboyant personality and eventual friendship with the Straw Hats.

keyMoments.title: Mission to Little Garden
keyMoments.description: Mr. 2 is sent to Little Garden to assassinate Mr. 3 for giving a false report to Crocodile, showing the ruthless nature of Baroque Works.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Mr. 2's role within Baroque Works and the organization's brutal hierarchy.

relationships.description: Akumai is a Billions agent who loyally follows and serves Mr. 2 Bon Kurei.

evolutionMoments.description: Akumai accompanies Mr. 2 on his mission to Little Garden.

relationships.description: Mr. 2 is sent to eliminate Mr. 3 for his failure on Little Garden.

evolutionMoments.description: Mr. 2 is dispatched to assassinate Mr. 3 for giving false reports to Crocodile.

reveals.information: Member of Baroque Works as Officer Agent Mr. 2
Flamboyant okama wearing ballet-themed clothing with swan motif
Sent to Little Garden to eliminate Mr. 3

keyMoments.title: Chess's First Appearance
keyMoments.description: Chess makes his first appearance in the episode, though he is not formally introduced yet. He will be revealed as the head of staff and minister of defense under King Wapol.
keyMoments.significance: Introduction of one of the antagonists of the Drum Island Arc.

reveals.information: Tall man with wavy lips and sad expression, wearing checkered green-blue jester-like costume

keyMoments.title: Akumai's First Appearance
keyMoments.description: Akumai makes his first appearance as a Billions agent serving under Mr. 2 Bon Kurei, accompanying him to Little Garden.
keyMoments.significance: Introduction of a loyal follower of Mr. 2 who will appear throughout the Alabasta Arc.

relationships.description: Akumai loyally serves and follows Mr. 2 Bon Kurei everywhere.

evolutionMoments.description: Akumai accompanies Mr. 2 on his mission to Little Garden.

reveals.information: Member of Baroque Works as a Billions agent under Mr. 2

keyMoments.title: Yuki's First Appearance
keyMoments.description: Yuki makes her first appearance in the episode.
keyMoments.significance: Introduction of a character who will appear in the Drum Island Arc.

keyMoments.title: Nami Shows First Symptoms of Illness
keyMoments.description: Nami begins showing symptoms of the Five-Day Disease, including exhaustion and sweating. She asks Vivi to watch the Eternal Pose.
keyMoments.significance: This begins the critical plot development that will lead to finding Chopper and highlights Nami's vulnerability.
keyMoments.quote: Vivi, can you watch the Eternal Pose for me? I need to rest for a bit.

keyMoments.title: Nami Collapses with High Fever
keyMoments.description: Nami's condition worsens dramatically as she collapses with a 40°C fever. Vivi explains this is extremely serious.
keyMoments.significance: This critical moment forces the crew to urgently seek medical help, setting the Drum Island Arc in motion.

keyMoments.title: Nami Predicts Cyclone Despite Illness
keyMoments.description: Despite being severely ill, Nami uses her exceptional navigation skills to predict an incoming cyclone and warns the crew.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Nami's incredible talent and dedication to the crew even when gravely ill.

relationships.description: Vivi takes care of Nami during her illness, showing their close friendship.

evolutionMoments.description: Vivi watches over sick Nami and explains her condition to the crew.

reveals.information: Contracted Five-Day Disease from Kestia tick bite on Little Garden
Can predict weather patterns even when severely ill

keyMoments.title: Vivi Explains Nami's Condition
keyMoments.description: Vivi recognizes the severity of Nami's 40°C fever and explains to the crew how serious this is, showing her medical knowledge.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Vivi's maturity and knowledge, helping the crew understand the urgency of the situation.
keyMoments.quote: A fever of 40 degrees... that almost never happens! This is very serious!

keyMoments.title: Vivi Explains Five-Day Disease
keyMoments.description: Vivi provides information about the Five-Day Disease caused by the Kestia tick from Little Garden.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Vivi's knowledge and helps establish the urgency of finding a doctor.

relationships.description: Vivi takes care of sick Nami, watching the Eternal Pose and monitoring her condition.

evolutionMoments.description: Vivi acts as Nami's caretaker during her illness.

reveals.information: Has medical knowledge about fevers and the Five-Day Disease
